Self.Name: Show-Projects-Closed-Table
Self.Description: Table view to show or edit multiple records.

Attribute.Name: InternalUse:ExistingRecordFormula
Attribute.Value:
if(project_actual_time>project_est_hours,"
 " + project_actual_time + "
","
 " + project_actual_time + "
")

Attribute.Name: InternalUse:ExistingRecordFormula
Attribute.Value:
if(project_cost>project_budget,"
 " + format(project_cost,"c") + "
","
 " + format(project_cost,"c") + "
")
